attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Ms Steinman

You make a number of serious allegations in your petition, which we are not in a position to verify. For this reason we have rejected your petition. 

If you would like to re-submit your petition, you can do so, but please make the request more general - ie request an inquiry into reports of malpractice by Cafcass workers. 

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
